amendment.description: Amendment to the Traficant amendment (A003) sought to clarify that nothing in this section shall be construed to authorize the deployment of members of the Armed Forces in contravention of United States law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to clarify that nothing in this section shall be construed as to authorize the deployment of the Armed Forces in contravention of United States law.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Reyes to the Traficant amendment (A003).
Reyes amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent. A modification to strike "amendment" and insert "section."
On agreeing to the Reyes amendment (A004) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 256 (Roll No. 439).
